Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' — 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'

General_Description: '''And My Pickaxe''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''"Break that boulder... Carry those rocks... Faster now!" I've absolutely had it with people telling me what to do. I'm going to start my own [[quarry]] on the other side of the [[Palace of Poseidon|palace]]. At least there I can dig for [[adamant]] in peace, and at my own pace.''
Section_Trivia: *The name of the Ainigmata Ostraka references {{Wiki|Gimli (Middle-earth)|Gimli}}, from ''{{Wiki|The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring}}'', saying "And my axe" when the Fellowship of the Ring is first formed.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
